SEARCH
Package Game.Entities.Commons

Class StateMachine

java.lang.Object
Game.Entities.Commons.StateMachine
public class StateMachine extends Object
StateMachine class that manages the states of a game object. It allows transitioning between different states and handles updates. Each state can define its own behavior for entering, exiting, and updating.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs an empty StateMachine.

  • Constructor Details

    • StateMachine

      public StateMachine()
      Constructs an empty StateMachine.

  • Method Details

    • setOwner

      public void setOwner(IEntity owner)
      Sets the owner entity for this state machine and initializes all states.
      Parameters:
      owner - the entity that owns this state machine

    • onUpdate

      public void onUpdate(double dT, InputEvent ie)
      Updates the current state of the state machine. This method should be called every frame for any owner logic.
      Parameters:
      dT - delta time since the last frame
      ie - input event
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no current state is set

    • setState

      public void setState(String state)
      Sets the current state of the state machine.
      Parameters:
      state - name of the new state If the state does not exist, does nothing and prints an error.

    • addState

      public void addState(String name, State state)
      Adds a new state to the state machine.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the state
      state - the state instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the state already exists

    • removeState

      public void removeState(String name)
      Removes a state from the state machine.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the state to remove If the state does not exist, does nothing and prints an error.

    • resetToDefault

      public void resetToDefault()
      Resets the state machine to the default state.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the default state is not set

    • getOwner

      public IGameObject getOwner()
      Gets the owner game object.
      Returns:
      the owner game object

    • setDefaultState

      public void setDefaultState(String defaultState)
      Sets the default state by name.
      Parameters:
      defaultState - the name of the default state
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the state does not exist

    • onCollision

      public void onCollision(IGameObject other)
      Forwards collision events to the current state.
      Parameters:
      other - the other game object collided with
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no current state is set

    • getCurrentStateName

      public String getCurrentStateName()
      Gets the name of the current state.
      Returns:
      the current state name

    • getDefaultStateName

      public String getDefaultStateName()
      Gets the name of the default state.
      Returns:
      the default state name

    • getState

      public State getState(String name)
      Gets a state by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the state
      Returns:
      the State instance if found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the state does not exist
